  • Method Details

    • setGameMapPathfinder

      public void setGameMapPathfinder(AStarPathFinder pathfinder)

    • add

      public void add(IPathfindNPC pathfinder)
      Adds a IPathfindNPC object to the PathfindManager. If a pathfinder with the same ID already exists in the manager, an error message is logged. Otherwise, the pathfinder is added to the manager. The IPathfinder is added to the manager for debug and management.
      Parameters:
      pathfinder - The IPathfind object to be added to the manager.

    • remove

      public void remove(IPathfindNPC pathfinder)
      Removes the specified IPathfindNPC object from the PathfindManager.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the list of pathfinders in the PathfindManager. This method removes all pathfinders from the manager.

    • getNodeForPosition

      public AStarNode getNodeForPosition(BoundsEntity entity)
      Retrieves the AStarPathNode object at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      entity - The BoundsEntity object representing the target for which to retrieve the node.
      Returns:
      The AStarPathNode at the specified position.

    • getNodeForWorldPosition

      public AStarNode getNodeForWorldPosition(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position)

    • findNearestWalkableNode

      public AStarNode findNearestWalkableNode(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 target)

    • getNodeForPosition

      public AStarNode getNodeForPosition(int posX, int posY)
      Retrieves the AStarPathNode object at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      posX - The x coordinate of the position.
      posY - The y coordinate of the position.
      Returns:
      The AStarPathNode at the specified position.

    • setPlayerPos

      public void setPlayerPos(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition)
      Called on every ClientPlayer redraw. Vector2 playerPosition is the position of the player relative to the world. This function automatically converts the player position to the position of the player relative to the tile nodes.

    • get

      public IPathfindNPC get(String id)
      Retrieves the IPathfind object associated with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the pathfinder.
      Returns:
      The IPathfind object associated with the specified ID.

    • getGameMapPathfinder

      @Null public AStarPathFinder getGameMapPathfinder()
      Retrieves the AStarPathFinder associated with the game map.
      Returns:
      The AStarPathFinder object representing the pathfinder for the game map.
